Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 3: World:
In Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 3: World Heroes' Mission, U.A. High School students Izuku Midoriya, Shouto Todoroki, and Katsuki Bakugou face the greatest crisis in Boku no Hero Academia history, with only two hours to save the world! During their internship with the number one Pro Hero Endeavor Agency, Deku and his new friend Rody find themselves wanted nationwide for a crime they didn’t commit. Can Deku and his friends stop Humarise’s global plans of eliminating all Quirks?

(Source: Funimation)
